title: AZ Alkmaar vs Manchester United: Europa League player ratings
text:
Manchester United drew 0-0 with AZ Alkmaar in a painfully tedious Europa League Group L clash in Holland.

Before the game, manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer said the plastic pitch was one of the "worst ones I have seen for a long while".

But it was not as terrible as United, who struggled to create any chances and did not manage a single shot on target.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

AZ had the better chances but David de Gea made a series of smart saves to keep them at bay.

Here are our player ratings.
